text: The Seventh-day Adventist Church in Sweden () is a Seventh-day Adventist denomination in Sweden. The first Seventh-day Adventist Church congregation in Sweden was established in Grythyttan in 1880. Circa 40 Swedish Seventh-day Adventist denominations were around in Sweden during the early 2000s. Most of them existed in Central Sweden. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website Category:1880 establishments in Europe Category:Protestantism in Sweden Category:1880s establishments in Sweden
title: Seventh-day Adventist Church in Sweden
